mapper.select: SELECT rt.room_type_id, rt.room_name, rt.room_grade, rt.bed_type, rt.view_type, rt.base_price, ri.image_url FROM room_type rt LEFT JOIN room_image ri ON rt.room_type_id = ri.room_type_id AND ri.is_main = 'Y' ORDER BY rt.room_type_id DESC

SELECT
rt.room_type_id, rt.room_name, rt.room_grade, rt.bed_type, rt.view_type, rt.base_price,
ri.image_url,
MIN( ROUND( rt.base_price * NVL(( SELECT se.price_rate FROM SEASON se WHERE rs.stay_date BETWEEN se.start_date AND se.end_date ORDER BY se.priority DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY ), 1) * NVL(wr.rate_multiplier, 1) ) ) AS min_price,
NVL(MIN(rs.available_count), 0) AS availableCount
FROM room_type rt
LEFT JOIN room_image ri ON rt.room_type_id = ri.room_type_id AND ri.is_main = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN room_stock rs ON rt.room_type_id = rs.room_type_id
LEFT JOIN weekday_rate wr ON wr.fk_hotel_id = rt.fk_hotel_id AND wr.day_of_week = TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(rs.stay_date, 'D'))
WHERE 1=1
AND rs.stay_date >= TO_DATE(#{check_in}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND rs.stay_date < TO_DATE(#{check_out}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND rt.fk_hotel_id = #{hotel}
AND rt.room_grade = #{room_grade}
AND rt.bed_type = #{bed_type}
AND rt.view_type = #{view_type}
GROUP BY rt.room_type_id, rt.room_name, rt.room_grade, rt.bed_type, rt.view_type, rt.base_price, ri.image_url
ORDER BY rt.base_price ASC
ORDER BY rt.base_price DESC
ORDER BY rt.room_type_id DESC

SELECT rt.room_type_id, rt.room_name, rt.room_grade, rt.bed_type, rt.view_type, rt.base_price, ri.image_url FROM room_type rt LEFT JOIN room_image ri ON rt.room_type_id = ri.room_type_id AND ri.is_main = 'Y' WHERE rt.room_type_id = #{roomId}
SELECT image_url FROM room_image WHERE room_type_id = #{value} ORDER BY sort_order

SELECT TO_CHAR(s.stay_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS stay_date,
ROUND( rt.base_price * NVL(( SELECT se.price_rate FROM SEASON se WHERE s.stay_date BETWEEN se.start_date AND se.end_date ORDER BY se.priority DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY ), 1) * NVL(wr.rate_multiplier, 1) ) AS final_price,
s.available_count
FROM ROOM_STOCK s JOIN ROOM_TYPE rt ON s.room_type_id = rt.room_type_id
LEFT JOIN WEEKDAY_RATE wr ON wr.fk_hotel_id = rt.fk_hotel_id AND wr.day_of_week = TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(s.stay_date, 'D'))
WHERE s.room_type_id = #{value} AND s.stay_date BETWEEN TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(SYSDATE), 12)
ORDER BY s.stay_date

SELECT * FROM room_type WHERE room_type_id IN
#{id}
